verses.text: I will give thanks \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* whole heart; I will shew forth all \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* marvelous works.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w and|strong="H3068"\w* exult \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thee: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* name, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w Most|strong="H3068"\w* \w High|strong="H6381"\w*.
When mine enemies turn back, \w they|strong="H8034"\w* stumble \w and|strong="H8034"\w* perish at \w thy|strong="H2167"\w* presence.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* hast maintained \w my|strong="H7725"\w* right \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w cause|strong="H7725"\w*; \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* satest \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* throne judging righteously.

\w Thou|strong="H6213"\w* hast rebuked \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations, \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* hast destroyed \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H6213"\w*, \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* hast blotted \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* name \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w and|strong="H4941"\w* ever.

\w The|strong="H8034"\w* enemy \w are|strong="H1471"\w* come \w to|strong="H1471"\w* an \w end|strong="H5703"\w*, \w they|strong="H8034"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* desolate \w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* cities \w which|strong="H1471"\w* thou hast overthrown, \w their|strong="H4229"\w* very \w memorial|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* perished.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H5892"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* sitteth \add as king \add*\w for|strong="H5892"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*: \w he|strong="H5892"\w* hath prepared \w his|strong="H1992"\w* throne \w for|strong="H5892"\w* judgment.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w world|strong="H5769"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* righteousness, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* minister \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* peoples \w in|strong="H3427"\w* uprightness.

\w The|strong="H8199"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3816"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* high tower \w for|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* oppressed, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* high tower \w in|strong="H8398"\w* times \w of|strong="H8199"\w* trouble;

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* know \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* name \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thee; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, hast \w not|strong="H1961"\w* forsaken \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* seek thee.

Sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Zion: \w declare|strong="H3045"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* doings.

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w maketh|strong="H3068"\w* inquisition \w for|strong="H3427"\w* blood remembereth \w them|strong="H5046"\w*: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* forgetteth \w not|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* poor.

\w Have|strong="H3588"\w* mercy upon \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w behold|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* affliction \add which I suffer \add*\w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hate \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* liftest \w me|strong="H7911"\w* up \w from|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gates \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w death|strong="H1818"\w*;

\w That|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* forth \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H7311"\w*: \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zion, \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* salvation.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* nations \w are|strong="H6726"\w* sunk down \w in|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pit \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w*: \w in|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* net \w which|strong="H5608"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* hid \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* own foot \w taken|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H7272"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* known, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w hath|strong="H7272"\w* \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1471"\w*: \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H6213"\w* snared \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* own hands. \qs Higaion. Selah\qs*

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* return \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol, \w even|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* nations \w that|strong="H3045"\w* forget \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* needy \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* alway \w be|strong="H1471"\w* forgotten, nor \w the|strong="H3605"\w* expectation \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poor perish \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w ever|strong="H7725"\w*.

Arise, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* man prevail: \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations \w be|strong="H3808"\w* judged \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H7911"\w* sight.

\w Put|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* know \w themselves|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3068"\w* men. \qs Selah\qs*
